resource_cfg.description: The Cray XK7 supercomputer located at the Oak Ridge Leadership Computing Facility (OLCF), (https://www.olcf.ornl.gov/titan/)
resource_cfg.label: ornl.titan_orte
resource_cfg.notes: Requires the use of an RSA SecurID on every connection.
